adDetails: Established designer, looking for new work in the videogame/film production industry. Looking for opportunities to build my portfolio. I am focusing in 2D environment design, but can develop pieces for character creation, weapon design, storyboarding and any facets of concept ideation. IF YOU'RE SERIOUS ABOUT A PROJECT AND NEED WORK DONE, please contact me via email for my professional site/any discussion about work/hourly rates.
